DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to establish if caffeine consumption is associated with the evolution of the disease in premanifest HD.
DOC.brief_title: Is Caffeine an Environmental Modifier in Huntington's Disease?
DOC.criteria: HD mutation carriers (>36 CAG) premanifest (total motor UHDRS < 5) estimated time to diagnosis between 3 and 10 years adults older than 21 years (in order to exclude juvenile patients who begin the disease before 21 years) informed consent signed with a social protection MRI contraindication pregnant and lactating women People under guardianship, trusteeship, deprive of freedom
